definition: way of handling sth/method for making/work method/recipe/practice/CL:個|个[ge4]

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The clever thing was to break the rules and stay alive all the same .
sentences.chinese: 聪明的做法，是把规矩破得巧，同时又得活得好。

sentences.english: It's the in-thing to do at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 这是目前最时兴的做法了。

sentences.english: This approach created for the treatment of induration after intramuscular injection is also very effective.
sentences.chinese: 用于创建硬化治疗后，这种做法肌肉注射也很有效。

sentences.english: The results indicate that using standard grade to arrange is better. Also, the concrete method is given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出用标准分排序更为合理，并给出具体做法。

sentences.english: Some practices in the China Church are difficult for people to understand.
sentences.chinese: 中国天主教会里面有一些做法让人实在看不懂。
他们无法想象向熊扔石头的做法。

sentences.english: Sweeping the carbon under the carpet, as it were.
sentences.chinese: 通常的做法是扫走地毯上的碳，当它产生的时候。

sentences.english: The practice of YueFang ships seriously threatened the life safety of Chinese fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 越方船只的做法严重威胁了中国渔民的生命安全。

sentences.english: Jiang Qing would not have approved.
sentences.chinese: 如果是江青，她一定不会任何这种做法。

sentences.english: The advantage of Microsoft's method is that it works better for on-screen reading.
sentences.chinese: 微软的做法的好处在于它更利于屏幕阅读。

sentences.english: Are there any requirements of exterior wall thermal insulation practice?Use common rockwool board.
sentences.chinese: 外墙保温做法有什么要求？采用普通岩棉板。

sentences.english: All it's doing is hyping everyone up.
sentences.chinese: “所有它的做法是每个人都大肆宣扬了”。

sentences.english: So she says she resorted to something a little crazy.
sentences.chinese: 所以她说她采取了一些看似有点疯狂的做法。

sentences.english: It was rather high-handed to punish the child for the accident.
sentences.chinese: 因意外事件而惩罚孩子是相当粗暴的做法。

sentences.english: The company also defended the sacking-by-text message(10) as a way to keep the modern.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司还辩解到，短信解聘也是跟上时代的做法。

sentences.english: As is, this wing would be great for kiting or ground handling practice.
sentences.chinese: 正如，这将是永放风筝或地勤的做法很好。

definition: course of action/method of doing sth/practice/modus operandi
way of eating/how something is eaten/how a dish is prepared/the way a dish is to be cooked
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
